parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The farm ID of the farm connected to the budget.

nested_items.name: budgetId
nested_items.description: The budget ID.

nested_items.name: usageTrackingResource
nested_items.description: The resource that the budget is tracking usage for.

nested_items.name: queueId
nested_items.description: The queue ID.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the budget.
ACTIVE---Get a budget being evaluated.
INACTIVE---Get an inactive budget. This can include expired, canceled, or deleted statuses.

nested_items.name: displayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the budget.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the budget.

nested_items.name: approximateDollarLimit
nested_items.description: The consumed usage limit for the budget.

nested_items.name: approximateDollarUsage
nested_items.description: The amount of the budget consumed.

nested_items.name: actions
nested_items.description: The budget actions for the budget.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The action taken on the budget once scheduling stops.

nested_items.name: thresholdPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage threshold for the budget.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The budget action description.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: When the budget starts.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: When the budget ends.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that created this resource.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was created.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The user or system that updated this resource.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was updated.

nested_items.name: queueStoppedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the queue stopped.
